availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jonathan Davis (Carter County, Kentucky, carpenter and farmer)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, carpenter and farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sarah Davis. Father of James A. Davis, Florence Davis, Hannah Davis, and William Davis. Carpenter in Carter County in 1860. Employed Thomas Hannen as a carpenter in Carter County in 1860. Farmer in Carter County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 263.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Grayson, p. 97B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Carter County, KY, October 1863, p. 38 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
